revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #40 Yache |image = [[File:Yache.png]] |caption = This Berry has a refreshing flavor that strikes a good balance of dryness and sourness. It tastes better chilled. This Berry slows the growth of nearby Berries. |growtime = 12h 0m 0s |harvest = 25 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} '''Yache''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Passho]] with 8 empty plots. The [[Passho]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour || 4 hours || 8 hours || 12 hours |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:YacheTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:YacheTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:YacheTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (growth speed) | ||
x0.9 ||
x0.8 ||
x0.7 |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain the Yache berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || || [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || || [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |} {{Berries}}
